DOC.brief_summary: In study , 10 mg tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 ) tablet administer healthy subject two separate dose occasion . On one occasion tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 ) tablet administer fasting condition ; On occasion tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 ) tablet administer fed condition follow standard breakfast meal . The amount tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 ) blood measure various time 24 hour follow dose occasion compare evaluate difference .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Effect Of Food On How Tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 ) Is Absorbed And Moves Through The Body Following Oral Administration Of Tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 ) Tablets To Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate effect food pharmacokinetics tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female ( nonchildbearing potential ) subject age 21 55 year . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight male > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . For female , total body weight > 45 kg ( 99 lb ) . No evidence active latent inadequately treated infection Mycobacterium tuberculosis ( TB ) Evidence history clinically significant illness , medical condition , disease . Evidence history clinically significant infection within past 3 month . Use tobacco nicotinecontaining product excess equivalent 5 cigarette per day .
